attributes.action: Abolish all current and future UK lockdowns
attributes.additional_details:
Cancel all current lockdowns in the UK and do not issue any further lockdowns. 
Cancel all curfews and rule of 6 and allow people to have their freedom back. Let the people decide where they want to go and who they want to go with!
attributes.background: Lockdowns in the UK have had devastating effects on livelihoods and the public’s mental health. The government should cancel all current lockdowns and not issue any further lockdowns which will cause even further devastation to well being & businesses.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Repeal the Coronavirus Act 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313310
